testcase.name: Create a new deal
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Free CRM Login Page........................................passed Then user enters username and password......................................passed Then user clicks on sign in button..........................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then user click on deal menu................................................passed Then user click on New button...............................................passed Then user enters title,description,amount...................................passed Then user click on save button..............................................passed And user close the browser..................................................passed
